about us
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
OUR MISSION IS CULTIVATING CONNECTION
/$
$
CONNECTION WITHIN THE COMMUNITY AND CONNECTING PEOPLE AND THEIR DOGS TO THE GREAT OUTDOORS
/$
$
$
$
BrewHound is a women + veteran created, operated + founded local business. We are a business with a purpose & that purpose is to spread love.
The love of dogs is what initially inspired this passionate idea, with a deep desire to create a space not only for them, but for community connection. Â Where folks can come together and bond and forge relationships over their common love of pups.
With the ideas inception, we didnâ€™t foresee the overwhelming, authentic love that would be showered upon this placeâ€¦ the deep connections made between folks of all ages, backgrounds + constitutions.Â  Itâ€™s been pure magic to witness + we are humbled by the love we too experience here.
And we wouldnâ€™t be able to make this all possible without our ever expanding BrewHound Fam of unique, talented, compassionate, individuals. Â We love & appreciate everyone who has & continues to step through our gates, thank you for being a part of this magic
Cheers,
Lauren
/$
$
/$
$
Park Layout
/$
$
$
$
/$
/$
$
$
The Yard
T
he Y
ard is BrewHounds off-leash dog park. Weâ€™ve dedicated the majority of our property for your dog to unlea
sh all their playful energy.The Yard features:
â€
â€“ Pet friendly turf grass
â€“ Separately fenced areas for large and small dogs
â€“ Cool, Shady areas
â€“ The Doggie Splash Pad
Along with all the fun and excitement, BrewHound has brought on trained â€Ruffareesâ€ to maintain a friendly and safe environment. Access to The Yard is member-based. BrewHound offers Daily, Monthly and Yearly memberships.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
The Porch
The porch is a covered, cabin-like structure with a concession style bar. This is where people can relax and enjoy conversation, refreshments and the outdoors.
The Porch features:
â€
â€“ A beer garden of locally sourced craft beer on tap
â€“ Wine on tap
â€“ Bold Bean specialty coffee + Yum Cha Tea
â€“ Specialty canned beers + spirits
No membership is required to enter The Porch and leashed dogs are welcome! Check out the events page to see upcoming events at
BrewHound!
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
BrewHound + The Environment
/$
$
Environmental consciousness is extremely important to us at BrewHound. We strive to make as little trash as possible, recycle whatever we can and protect the great outdoors and its resources
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
We also utilize the following green business practices:
/$
/$
$
$
Incorporation of renewably and/or sustainably sourced construction materials
â€‹
Installation of solar panels and sky lights
â€‹
Digital communication where feasible to save those trees
â€‹
Use of hand dryers vs. paper towels
â€‹
Use of reusable drink wear
â€‹
Recycling all items possible including coffee grounds for gardeners
â€‹
Installation of low flow toilets
â€‹
& other eco-friendly methods realized along the way

8th Annual National Dog Day Festival
Saturday, August 23rd
, 5pm - 9:00pm
â€‹
â€‹
BrewHound is hosting its 8th Annual National Dog Day Festival!
The day is all about celebrating â˜
â€‹
DOGS - the impact they have on our lives
COMMUNITY - coming together to spread love
& THE WILD PLACES - exploring + respecting the great outdoors that nurture us all
& we are celebrating The London Sanctuary's 15 YEARS in Service!
â€‹
â†  FREE ICE CREAM from Cookies + Cream to benefit The London Sanctuary
â†  SILENT AUCTION & RAFFLE! BrewHound ANNUAL membership swag basket as well as many local business gift cards + services!
â†  LIVE MUSIC w/ Jesse Sawyer
â†  MAS Smoked Meats
â†  PHOTO BOOTH for you + your pup
â†  PET WANTS + more!
â€‹
BrewHound will be gathering back to school donations for San Pablo Elementary School
items of need are:
dry erase markers
glue sticks
tissues
pencils + erasers
plastic folders (3 prong)
cleaning wipes
hand sanitizer + soap
copy paper
composition book
zip log baggies
crayola crayons
children's scissors
1- inch binders
colored markers + pencils
wide-rules notebook paper
â€‹
*EACH DONATION gets you 1 RAFFLE TICKET for your chance to WIN an annual BrewHound membership basket!
â€‹
Join us & OUR FRIENDS, The London Sanctuary Hound Rescue for the FESTIVITIES!
â€‹
This event will benefit local dog rescue's The London Sanctuary who rehome tons of pups in our community. Come hear their stories + meet some adoptable pups!
â€‹
FAMILY FRIENDLY // FREE entry to events area // Drizzle or Shine
/$
$
/$
$
Summer Movie Nights!
Every
Thursday
night at sunsetâ€‹
â€‹
Its MOVIE time!
join us every Thursday this Summer for a movie on the BIG screen!
we've got drinks for kiddos + adults as well as snacks + your welcome to bring snacks or dinner too (ğ˜«ğ˜¶ğ˜´ğ˜µ ğ˜¯ğ˜° ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜µğ˜´ğ˜ªğ˜¥ğ˜¦ ğ˜¥ğ˜³ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¬ğ˜´)
â€‹
June 26th Shrek!
July 3rd Sandlot
July 10th Star Wars A New Hope
July 17th The Goonies
July 24th Up
July 31st Big
August 7th Honey I Shrunk the Kids
August 14th Inside Out
August 21st Back to the Future
â€‹
Grab a friend, a blanket or chair, some chocolate milks or beers at the bar & get cozy for movie night
Viewable inside + outside The Yard
Free movie // very very family-friendly
